title: Huntress
description: Love was never so scary...The Night World is all around us - a secret society of vampires, werewolves, witches and creatures of darkness. They're beautiful - and deadly - and it's so easy to fall in love...Jez Redfern is wild and dangerous, and the leader of a gang of Night World vampires.But Jez discovers a shocking secret, and faces a terrifying choice: she must either remain a deadly crusader of evil, or fight to protect innocent mortals from her former friends...But can she resist her instinct for blood?
author: L.J. Smith
